title: Can Piketty really understand after one day here?
text:
WE are a country of haves and have-nots. A disparate country of rural peasants and an urbane first world , having the unfortunate coincidence of living in the same country at the same time .
The have-nots seem to aver education , hard work and saving and a work ethic ( or any ethics), and some 17 million of them prefer to get by on a “government ”grant paid by the first world community.
Graft and corruption seem to be the fail-safe way forward , by our elected leaders and all their henchmen, from the president downwards.
The inept government is riddled with pseudo workers so that little works as planned.
Now a fellow wet behind the ears , and of uncertain and untested competence says we should divide the wealth of the country equally between all, so that we can all live in ignominy.
Nice try to impose a socialistic experiment in Africa , all of which have failed miserably thus far, both here and in Europe, if you have not yet noticed
